title: Better skin? Arcade riven or dunky Darius.
body: I know it is based on opinion I would just like to know your opinion on which skin you like better so it can help my choice. Cheers!

replies.body:
I have to say Dunkmaster Darius for obvious reasons (being a level 7 main who plays only with the skin)

Also remember it's a legendary skin so it's obviously better then a 1350 skin anyway

Between those 2, Dunkmaster Darius is better imo mostly for the uniqueness and the funny factor, though that's probably also because I am never that much of a fan for the Arcade skins in the first place (I mean they ain't bad or anything, but for me most of them is like "ehh it's okay").
wait till the newest riven skin comes out which is you guys know that already: AngleBlade Riven

Just get the new riven skin when it comes out, problem solved.

New model, new voice over, new effects, win win win.

Wrong board.... put this in Misc

Arcade riven looks better and is newer, dunkrius is a terrible skin considering all his other skins are 100x better, the only difference is his voice over

Darius has a new voice over _(and that is always a strong case)_. 

But I think that Riven's skin, despite not having a voice over, actually feels more different to the normal skin, than Darius's one. _(arcade sound effects are pretty distinctive)_

Plus, her recall is amazing, one of my fave in the game! and her skin is better design wise _(in my opinion)_
So I would choose Riven, but i don't play either of them, so don't hold my opinion too highly.

all that being said though.... Riven doesn't have chroma packs :P
